name: Devil Man
description:
This game is a student project made for the "10 seconds or less" Jam for my university's module. Although the game is a little janky, it's playable, and I've attempted to give it charm with the loveable-not-loveable character Uncle Festus. This game has audio! Please balance it at your own discretion.

I take credit for all of the games graphics and code. Sound effect was provided by FreeSound/user Timbre. Game OST is "Also Sprach Brooks" from Catherine composed by Shoji Meguro.
